top.text: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each face-down card in this line.

middle.text: Flip all other face-up cards in this line.

top.text: Ignore all middle commands of cards in this line.

bottom.emphasis: When this card would be covered:
bottom.text: First, flip this card.

middle.text: Flip 1 of your opponent's face-up cards.
You may flip 1 of your face-up covered cards.

bottom.text: Draw the top card of your opponent´s deck. Discard 1 card into their trash.

middle.text: Draw the top card of your opponent's deck. Your opponent draws the top card of your deck.
In each line, flip 1 covered card.

bottom.text: Draw the top card of your opponent´s deck. Your opponent draws the top card of your deck.

middle.text: Rearrange your protocols. Rearrange your opponent´s protocols.

bottom.text: This card may be played without matching protocols.
Discard your hand. Draw that many cards.

top.text: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each card in your hand.
Reveal the top card of your deck. You may discard the top card of your deck.

bottom.emphasis: When this card would be covered:
bottom.text: First, draw 3 cards.

middle.text: Reveal your deck. Draw 1 card with a value of 1 revealed this way. Shuffle your deck. Play 1 card with a value of 1.
Reveal your deck. Draw 1 card with a value of 5 revealed this way. Shuffle your deck.
You may shuffle your trash into your deck.

top.text: Flip 1 face-up covered or uncovered card in this stack other than this card.

bottom.text: You may play this card in any line on either player´s side.

bottom.emphasis: When a card would be returned to your opponent´s hand:
bottom.text: Put that card on top of their deck face-down instead.

top.text: Your opponent discards 1 card.

middle.text: You may flip 1 face-up covered card.

top.text: Either discard 1 card or delete this card.
If you have no cards in hand, draw 1 card.

bottom.text: You may discard 1 card. If you do, your opponent discards 1 card.

middle.text: Delete 1 of your opponent´s cards in a line where they have a highter total value than you do

bottom.text: If your opponent has a highter total value than you do in this line, draw 1 card.
You may shift this card to the line where your opponent has their highest total value.

top.text: If your opponent has a higher value in this line than you do, flip this card.

middle.text: Draw 3 cards. Shift 1 of your opponent's covered cards.
Flip 1 of your opponent's cards. You may shift that card.

top.text: All face-down cards in this stack have a value of 4.

middle.text: You may flip 1 covered card in this line.
Play 1 card face-down in another line.
Delete 1 card from each other line.

top.text: You may draw 1 card. If you do, delete 1 other card. Then, delete this card.

middle.text: Delete all cards in 1 line with values of 1 or 2.
Delete a card with a value of 0 or 1.

top.text: If there are not at least 3 different protocols on cards in the field, delete this card.
During your turn, your opponent´s cards do not have middle commands.

middle.text: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent discards their hand and draws the amount of cards discarded minus 1.

bottom.text: Shift 1 of your opponent´s covered or uncovered cards in this line.
You discard a card.

bottom.emphasis: When this card would be covered:
bottom.text: First, draw 1 card. Then, flip 1 other card.

middle.text: Discard 1 card. If you do, delete 1 card.
Discard 1 card. If you do, return 1 card.

bottom.text: You may discard 1 card. If you do, flip 1 card.

middle.text: Discard 1 or more cards. Draw the amount discarded plus 1.
For every 2 cards in this line, play the top card of your deck face-down under this card.
Draw 2 cards. Shift 1 card either to or from this line.
Flip 1 card. Shift that card to this line.
Shift 1 face-down card to this line.
Your opponent plays the top card of their deck face-down in this line.
Discard 3 cards. Delete 1 card. Delete 1 card.
Delete your highest value uncovered card. Delete your opponent's highest value uncovered card.

top.text: Draw 1 card.

bottom.emphasis: When this card would be covered:
bottom.text: First, delete the lowest value covered card in this line.

bottom.emphasis: After your opponent plays a card in this line:
bottom.text: Your opponent discards 1 card.

middle.text: If this card is covered, you may shift it.

top.text: If you have any cards in your hand, you cannot draw cards.
If this card is covered, delete this card.

middle.text: Play the top card of your deck face-down in each line where you have a card.
Draw 1 card. You may flip 1 face-down card.

bottom.emphasis: When this card would be covered:
bottom.text: First, play the top card of your deck face-down in another line.

middle.text: If this card is covering a card, draw 1 card.
Flip 1 card. Draw cards equal to that card's value.

bottom.text: Draw 1 card.

middle.text: Draw 2 cards. Reveal 1 face-down card. You may shift or flip that card.
Shift all face-down cards in this line to another line.
Draw the top card of your opponent's deck.

bottom.text: You may give 1 card from your hand to your opponent. If you do, draw 2 cards.

middle.text: Take 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Give 1 card from your hand to your opponent.
Reveal 1 card from your hand. Flip 1 card.
State a number. Draw 3 cards. Reveal 1 card drawn with the face-up value of your stated number. You may play it.
Play the top card of your deck face-down. Flip that card, ignoring its middle commands.
Discard the top card of your deck. Draw cards equal to the value of the discarded card.
State a protocol. Discard the top card of your opponent´s deck. If the discarded card matches the stated protocol, delete 1 card.
Discard the top card of your deck. Delete 1 covered or uncovered card that shares a value with the discarded card.

top.text: Your opponent's total value in this line is reduced by 2.

middle.text: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent cannot compile on their next turn.

top.text: Your opponent cannot play cards face-down in this line.

middle.text: Draw 1 card. Delete all cards in 1 other line with 8 or more cards.

top.emphasis: When this card would be covered or flipped:
top.text: First, delete this card.
Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each of your opponent´s cards in this line.

bottom.text: You may resolve the middle command of 1 of your opponent´s cards as if it were on this card.

middle.text: Swap all of your cards in one of your stacks with another one of your stacks.
Flip 1 of your cards. Flip 1 of your opponent´s cards in the same line.

bottom.text: Draw 1 card.
If your hand is empty, draw 1 card.

middle.text: You may discard 1 card. Flip 1 card thas has a value greater than the number of cards in your hand.

bottom.emphasis: After you discard cards during your opponent´s turn:
bottom.text: Draw 1 card.

middle.text: If you have more then 1 card in your hand, flip this card.

bottom.text: Your opponent cannot play cards in this line.

top.text: Draw 1 card.

middle.text: Discard 1 or more cards. Your opponent discards the amount of cards discarded plus 1.

bottom.text: Your opponent deletes 1 of their face-down cards. You may flip this card.

middle.text: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent discards 2 cards, then reveals their hand.

top.text: Your opponent can only play cards face-down.

bottom.text: Flip this card.

middle.text: Your opponent discards 2 cards. Rearrange their protocols.
Your opponent discards 1 card. Shift 1 of their cards.

bottom.text: You may return 1 of your opponent's cards. If you do, flip this card.

middle.text: Play the top card of your deck face-down in each line with a face-down card.
Flip 1 of your cards. You may shift that card.

top.text: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each face-down card in this line.

middle.text: Play 1 card face-down in a line with a face-down card.

top.text: Draw 1 card.

top.emphasis: When this card would be deleted by compiling:
top.text: Shift this card, even if this card is covered.

bottom.text: You may shift 1 of your cards. If you do, flip this card.

middle.text: Shift 1 of your opponent's face-down cards.

bottom.text: Skip your check cache phase.

top.text: When you play cards face-up, they may be played without matching protocols.

bottom.text: Either discard 1 card or flip this card.

top.text: You may shift this card, even if this card is covered.

middle.text: Swap the positions of 2 of your protocols
Play 1 card from your trash. Shuffle your trash into your deck.
Flip 1 covered card. Discard your entire deck.

top.text: Draw 1 card and you may shift this card.

middle.text: If there are any cards in your trash, you may shuffle your trash into your deck.
Reveal 1 card from your trash. Play it face-down in another line.
If there is another Unity card in the field, either flip 1 card or draw 1 card.

bottom.emphasis: When this card would be flipped by a Unity card:
bottom.text: First flip one card or draw 1 card.

middle.text: If there is another Unity card in the field, you may flip 1 card.

top.text: You may flip this card.

bottom.text: You may delete 1 card.
Discard any number of cards. Refresh.
Your opponent discards their hand.
You may play 1 card face-down.

middle.text: Flip 1 other card. Flip this card.
Play the top card of your deck face-down in each other line.
Return all cards with a value of 2 in 1 line.
